column1: The Petitioners are seeking a mandate inter-alia, in the nature of;

column2: 1.  Writs of Certiorari quashing the interview conducted by the 2nd to 6th Respondents
on  14-01-2019, interview marks  contained in  P26, the  decision of  the  Board  of
the  1st  Respondent  Authority  consisting  of  2nd  and  8th
Respondents approving the interview results and the appointments given to the 20th
to  28th  Respondents as  Zonal Tea  Development Extension Officers by  the  letter
2.  A  Writ  of  Mandamus compelling  the  Board  of  Directors  of  the  1st  Respondent
Authority  to  conduct  a  fresh  interview  for  the  post  of  Zonal  Tea  Development
Extension Officers with a properly constituted interview panel.
